```{r, include = FALSE}
# importing, cleaning up, and combining metabolism data from all incubations
### 210301 TC Ambient data
dat1 <- read_csv("data/210301_tahoecity_ambient_inc/210301_TC_ambient_rates.csv")

dat1 <- dat1 %>%
  select(chamber, temp_C, water_volume_L, total_DW_g:nutrient_trt) %>% # selecting only the columns I need
  rename(chamber_vol_L = water_volume_L) # renaming this column to be consistent between experiments

### 210315 TC Enriched data
dat2 <- read_csv("data/210315_tahoecity_enriched_inc/210315_TC_enriched_rates.csv")

dat2 <- dat2 %>%
  mutate(chamber = substr(dat2$chamber, nchar(dat2$chamber) - 1, nchar(dat2$chamber))) %>%# removing the word "chamber" from the column and only keeping the number
 rename(chamber_vol_L = water_volume_L) # renaming this column to be consistent between experiments

dat2$chamber <- as.numeric(dat2$chamber) # coercing chamber column to be numeric
```
